creator: jari.aalto@cante.net
text:
DESCRIPTION

  Add support for environment variable substitutions, like in:

  Include /etc/apache/$HOSTNAME/server.conf

MOTIVATION

When maintaining several web servers (development and stable), these servers
are almost identical in settings except few key variables. Like webmaster
address, memory specific settings, etc.

It would help maintaining common site wide Apache setup for several hosts, if
the "Include" directive supported environment variable substitutions.

creator: nd@perlig.de
text: That should already work (but is badly documented). Try ${HOSTNAME}.
